meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7754.

td.p: Kurt Buhring, a professor from Granger, Indiana
Melissa Anthony, a graduate student from Fairhope, Alabama
Josh Hill, a network engineer from North Little Rock, Arkansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,600)

tr.td: IT BEARS MY NAME
NATURE
SHOW RUNNERS
AUTHORS USE NEW WORDS
10,000 MANIAC
THESE ARE DAYS
